What is (are) Syndrome of inappropriate antidiuretic hormone ?,"Syndrome of inappropriate antidiuretic hormone (SIADH) occurs when an excessive amount of antidiuretic hormone is released resulting in water retention and a low sodium level. It is most common among older people.
